warning_signs: Marks that rub off or are painted on
Inconsistent marks (18K mark but piece is magnetic)
Marks that don't match country of origin claim
ITALY stamp without proper Italian hallmarks

china_hong_kong.notes: HK uses chop marks. Mainland varies.

historical_marks.various_heads: Complex system by era and region

canada.system: Similar to US - no mandatory hallmarking

france.makers_mark: Lozenge shape (diamond) with initials and symbol
france.system: Eagle head (gold), Minerva head (silver) + maker's lozenge

italy.notes: Modern system since 1968. Older pieces may have different marks.
italy.purity: Usually marked 750, 585, 375 for gold; 925, 800 for silver
italy.system: Star mark + number (province code) + maker code

taxco.notes: Silver capital of Mexico. Look for 'Taxco' or 'TH' marks.

date_letters.notes: Complex system - reference chart needed for accurate dating
date_letters.system: Alphabetic cycle, font/shield shape changes each cycle

united_kingdom.system: Assay office marks + date letters + maker's marks

native_american.authenticity: Buy from reputable sources. Many fakes exist.
native_american.notes: Usually unmarked or artist signed. Hallmarks rare.

united_states.system: No mandatory hallmarking. Maker's marks and purity stamps voluntary.

gold_filled.notes: Fraction = gold content by weight. 1/20 = 5% gold. Can last decades.

gold_plated.notes: Thin layer, will wear. Minimal gold value.

vermeil.notes: Must be gold over sterling. Has silver value.

9K.notes: Not legally gold in US/Canada but common in UK imports

at_home: Acid test (small scratch in hidden area)
in_store: Magnet test (no attraction = could be precious)

usage_notes.location_tips: Check inside bands, clasp plates, bail loops, back of settings, pin stems
usage_notes.wear_patterns: Hallmarks on high-wear areas may be illegible

bakelite.notes: Carved, laminated, reverse-carved painted most valuable.
bakelite.authenticity_notes: Test with Simichrome polish (yellow residue = real). Hot water releases formaldehyde smell. Heavy weight. Carved and laminated pieces highest value.

catalin.notes: Cast phenolic, often marbled colors. Tests same as Bakelite.
catalin.authenticity_notes: Same tests as Bakelite. Marbled/swirled colors common. Check for color oxidation (confirms age). Heavy weight.

celluloid.notes: Early plastic. Flammable. Often imitated ivory/tortoise.
celluloid.authenticity_notes: CAUTION: Flammable - don't hot needle test. Lighter than Bakelite. Grain pattern (tortoise/ivory imitation). Age cracking common.

lucite.notes: Clear or colored acrylic. Carved, embedded objects.
lucite.authenticity_notes: Clear acrylic. Embedded objects (flowers, shells) common. Check for UV yellowing on vintage. Scratches easily vs glass.

balenciaga.authenticity_notes: Check BALENCIAGA stamp. Made in Italy. Hardware quality. Limited faking on jewelry.

celine.authenticity_notes: CÉLINE (with accent) vs CELINE varies by era. Made in Italy. Check hardware weight and stamping quality.

chanel.authenticity_notes: Check CC logo alignment and stamp quality. Made in France. Season date codes on some pieces. Very heavy faking.

dior.authenticity_notes: Vintage uses CHR.DIOR or CHRISTIAN DIOR. Check stamp clarity. Made in Germany on vintage. Heavy faking.

givenchy.authenticity_notes: Check GIVENCHY stamp. G logo on clasps. Made in France. Moderate faking.

gucci.authenticity_notes: Check GUCCI stamp and GG logo precision. Made in Italy. Serial numbers on fine pieces. Heavy faking.

hermes.authenticity_notes: HERMÈS PARIS stamp. Made in France. Enamel clic-clac bracelets, silver chains collectible. Heavy faking.

lanvin.authenticity_notes: Check LANVIN stamp. Made in France. Vintage pieces higher value. Limited faking.

ysl.authenticity_notes: Check YSL logo precision. Made in France. Arty ring collectible. Moderate faking.

designer_fashion_jewelry.description: Fashion house jewelry — both precious and costume

boucheron.authenticity_notes: Check BOUCHERON stamp. Made in France. Serial numbers. Expert authentication recommended.

bulgari.authenticity_notes: BVLGARI (Roman spelling) stamp. Made in Italy. Serial numbers. B.Zero1, Serpenti lines popular. Heavy faking.

cartier.authenticity_notes: Serial numbers should match records. Made in France. Love, Juste un Clou, Tank iconic. Very heavy faking - expert auth required.

chopard.authenticity_notes: Check CHOPARD stamp. Made in Switzerland. Serial numbers. Happy Diamonds line popular. Expert auth recommended.

david_yurman.authenticity_notes: DY hallmark. Made in USA. Cable bracelet signature. Check sterling/gold stamps. Moderate faking.

harry_winston.authenticity_notes: HW hallmark. Made in USA. Serial numbers. Very rare on secondary market. Expert auth required.

ippolita.authenticity_notes: IPPOLITA stamp. Made in Italy. 18K gold and sterling pieces. Rock Candy line popular. Limited faking.

john_hardy.authenticity_notes: JH hallmark. Made in Bali. Hand-woven chain. Check for Bali origin stamp. Limited faking.

lagos.authenticity_notes: LAGOS stamp. Made in USA. Caviar beading signature. Check sterling stamps. Limited faking.

marco_bicego.authenticity_notes: MARCO BICEGO stamp. Made in Italy. Hand-twisted gold coil signature. 18K hallmarks. Limited faking.

roberto_coin.authenticity_notes: Tiny ruby hidden inside every piece - signature mark. RC stamp. Made in Italy. Limited faking.

tiffany.authenticity_notes: © TIFFANY & CO stamp required. 925 or 750 with metal type. Made in USA. Very heavy faking - check stamps carefully.

van_cleef_arpels.authenticity_notes: VCA hallmark. Made in France. Serial numbers. Alhambra motif iconic. Expert auth required. Heavy faking.

fine_jewelry_houses.description: Major jewelry houses — precious metal pieces

alice_caviness.authenticity_notes: Check for Alice Caviness or Alice stamp. NYC maker. Nature motifs (leaves, flowers). Early pieces unsigned.

boucher.notes: Marcel Boucher. High quality, detailed work.
boucher.authenticity_notes: MB with Phrygian cap hallmark. BOUCHER stamp. NYC maker. High quality metalwork. Cartier-trained designer.

christian_lacroix.authenticity_notes: Christian Lacroix or CL stamp. Made in France. Oversized baroque style. Check for solid construction.

coro.notes: Vendome and Francois lines higher value.
coro.authenticity_notes: CORO, Corocraft, Vendome, or Francois stamps. Vendome/Francois lines higher quality. Duette mechanism on vintage clips.

demario.authenticity_notes: DeMario or DeMario NY stamp. NYC maker. Baroque pearls, antiqued gold finish. Intricate beadwork.

eisenberg.notes: Original line most valuable. Ice line = rhinestones.
eisenberg.authenticity_notes: Eisenberg Original (highest value), Eisenberg Ice, or script E stamp. Large Swarovski crystals. Heavy metal.

har.notes: Figural pieces, dragon series highly collectible.
har.authenticity_notes: HAR stamp. Figural pieces - dragon, genie, Asian themes highly collectible. Enamel and stone work.

hattie_carnegie.authenticity_notes: Hattie Carnegie or HC stamp. NYC fashion house. Early pieces higher value. Quality varies by era.

hobe.authenticity_notes: HOBÉ (with accent) stamp. NYC/France maker. Venetian glass beads. Sterling silver findings on early pieces.

hollycraft.notes: Pastel rhinestones, often dated on back.
hollycraft.authenticity_notes: HOLLYCRAFT stamp, often with date (e.g., 1954). Pastel aurora borealis stones. Dated pieces easier to authenticate.

jomaz.authenticity_notes: JOMAZ stamp. Mazer family NYC jewelers. High quality rhinestones. Related to Mazer Bros earlier pieces.

joseff_hollywood.notes: Made for films. Russian gold finish signature.
joseff_hollywood.authenticity_notes: Joseff or Joseff Hollywood stamp. Russian gold finish (matte antique gold). Made for film productions. Highly collectible.

kenneth_jay_lane.authenticity_notes: KJL or Kenneth Jay Lane stamp. NYC designer. Celebrity reproductions. Quality varies by era. Check for solid construction.

kramer.authenticity_notes: KRAMER or Kramer of New York stamp. NYC maker. Made pieces for Dior. Quality rhinestone work.

lisner.authenticity_notes: LISNER stamp. NYC maker. Leaf and nature designs. Quality rhinestones. Mass-produced but collectible.

miriam_haskell.notes: Baroque pearls, intricate beadwork. Early pieces unsigned.
miriam_haskell.authenticity_notes: Miriam Haskell or horseshoe stamp. Early pieces unsigned. Wired baroque pearls. Filigree backing. NYC maker. Highly collectible.

monet.authenticity_notes: MONET stamp. Quality basics. Vintage (pre-1980) more valuable. Check for solid construction.

napier.authenticity_notes: NAPIER stamp. Connecticut maker. Consistent quality. Book pieces and figural designs higher value.

regency.authenticity_notes: REGENCY stamp. High quality rhinestones. Often aurora borealis finish. Check stone prong settings.

robert_original.authenticity_notes: Original by Robert stamp. NYC maker. Glass beadwork and art glass pieces. Check for wired beads.

schreiner.notes: Made for Dior, Givenchy. Inverted stones signature.
schreiner.authenticity_notes: SCHREINER NEW YORK stamp (often unsigned). Inverted rhinestones signature. Made for Dior, Givenchy runway. Highly collectible.

sherman.authenticity_notes: SHERMAN stamp. Canadian maker (Montreal). Swarovski crystals in prong settings, never glued. Aurora borealis specialty.

stanley_hagler.authenticity_notes: Stanley Hagler NYC stamp. Later pieces by Ian St. Gielar. Elaborate hand-wired beadwork, shells, seed pearls. Heavy pieces.

trifari.notes: Crown Trifari most collectible. Alfred Philippe designs.
trifari.authenticity_notes: Crown Trifari mark (crown over T) most collectible. TKF = Trifari Krussman Fishel. Alfred Philippe jelly bellies highly valuable.

weiss.authenticity_notes: WEISS stamp. NYC maker. High quality Austrian rhinestones. Black japanned settings popular. Check stone quality.

vintage_costume_collectible.description: Signed vintage costume with high collector value

meta.purpose: Jewelry brand valuation and hallmark identification guide
